Title: Inside Out
Writer: Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen, Meg LeFauve
Actors: Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black
Plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

Title: Die Hard
Writer: Roderick Thorp, Jeb Stuart, Steven E. de Souza
Actors: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia
Plot: A New York City police officer tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. 8 wins & 8 nominations total

Title: The Skin I Live In
Writer: Pedro Almodóvar, Agustín Almodóvar, Thierry Jonquet
Actors: Antonio Banderas, Elena Anaya, Jan Cornet
Plot: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Award28 wins & 69 nominations total

Title: Spirited Away
Actors: Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino
Plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: Priceless
Actors: Audrey Tautou, Gad Elmaleh, Marie-Christine Adam
Plot: Jean, a shy waiter who works at a high-end hotel, is mistaken for a young millionaire by the beautiful and intriguing fortune hunter Irene.
